title: I’m doing it~!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Wh~y does the number one idol in the universe, this Nico Nii, have to do something like homework!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s because Umi-chan and Eli-chan got angry at you, Nico-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Can you stop saying it like they only got mad at Nico? You got yelled at too right, Honoka<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s right~. Aah, but no matter how much they get angry at me, I don’t understand what I don’t understand, and I don’t want to do what I don’t want to do~, I guess I am doing it though~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s so true. We’re doing it, but we don’t really want to do it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah yeah, we don’t really have a choice either huh~.... Ah, that’s right, Nico-chan did you hear? Kotori-chan told me the other day that….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Shh, be quiet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmph! Pwah! What’s up all of the sudden, Nico-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>….These footsteps…. It’s Eli! Honoka, open your notebook and pretend to do something!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>W-, wait! My notebook is still in my bag!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
